name: myapp
description: A software to edit data Interactively

scripts.build: electron-packager . "Interactive Data Editor" --ignore=node_modules --asar=true --overwrite --icon=icons/charts.ico --app-copyright="Koushik Naskar" --app-version="1.1.1" --prune=true --version-string.CompanyName="Koushik Naskar" --version-string.FileDescription="Interactive Data Editor" --version-string.OriginalFilename="Interactive Data Editor" --version-string.InternalName="Interactive Data Editor"  --version-string.ProductName="Interactive Data Editor"

author: Koushik Naskar
